item.title: The Worst Blogging Advice I Ever Received
item.description: No annoying intro here. This is it: “When starting a blog, be sure to update it regularly” I’ve actually heard or read this general “nugget” many times. It is as ubiquitous as it is terrible. One reason is that it’s only applicable to one type of blog. The kind that is monetized, relying on a large group of subscribers, with aspirations of generating a livable wage for the author. Obviously, there are many types of blogs.
